text: Waheed Abdul-Ridha (born May 22, 1983) is an Iraqi boxer. He competed at the 2016 Summer Olympics in the men's middleweight event, in which he was eliminated in the round of 32 by Misael Rodríguez. He was the flag bearer for Iraq at the Parade of Nations. ==References== Category:1983 births Category:Living people Category:Iraqi male boxers Category:Olympic boxers of Iraq Category:Boxers at the 2016 Summer Olympics Category:Boxers at the 2010 Asian Games Category:Boxers at the 2014 Asian Games Category:Asian Games competitors for Iraq Category:Middleweight boxers
title: Waheed Abdul-Ridha
